++ Computer Stages

The CS are what happens when a machine is switched on.
    * CS is a [SystemAwareness].
    * [Portalling] exists for each stage for a ComprehensiveSystem.

++Stages
    * BIOS
    * [Bootup]
    * [Startup]
    * [Standby]
    * [Shutdown]

Since LogDurationsToo means that the duration is logged, this information can be used for [Portalling]. Graphs represent the time taken boot stages and those individual components.

To maintain MinimumWrites, [PhysicalEndpoint]s are to be used as much as possible.
